column5: Sweet fish Lew.  Maybe next year for us..
Beauti fish Lew.  And you're smiling inside, right?
Nice ski Lew
You make it look so easy year after year Lew. Congrats, and I can't wait to see the next one.
Wow what a fish! Nice job Lew, pretty decent photo as well doing it on your own. Already your trip can be classified a fishing success regardless what happens the rest of the way.
Now wait a minute Lew, that's not the same pic I saw. Wish I was there .....oh wait I was lol
Nice fish Lew...I'll be up there on the main lake this weekend looking for her big ugly mamma!
Gorgeous ski Lew. Then again, they are the only species on this planet I prefer big and fat!  Cheers, Ron...
Thought I'd add this other picture of the fish when she tried to dislocate my shoulder just as the camera clicked. Tough to hold those big slimers still when they decide otherwise
Awesome Muskie Lew!!...I'm envious. She's a beauty
Nice fish Lew?  In the last pic - who won the fight?
Looks like you're thinking of throwing that beast over your shoulder for a fireman carry  can't imagine handling squirrely musky that size
Great self portrait!!
That is one fat fish for sure.
Real nice fish . No what you mean tough fishing my son and I fished the upper French where it empties in to the lake . Nice fish hard to get them to eat
Wow, me thinks 'nice' would be an understatement.  Thanks for sharing that catch with us Lew.  She's a real beaut!  The smile on your face says it all!  Oh wait...  lol
If I ever did smile in one of my reports Mike, you guys wouldn't have anyone to chuck bull at    edit to add.....Silly word censor
Thick fish Lew!!  Well done
Still waiting for another pic. :-)
Great fish Lew.  Lakair usually is good to you each year.
Sweet fish Lew!
I always hit up the French.... maybe one of these days Im going to have plan a trip to West arm.... Youre consistancy out there makes me jelous Lew.
I love that second pic!  Beauty fish!  S.
Nice big quality fish!  This picture really shows the girth of that beast.  Great stuff

Mornin boyz, my wife and I are up at Lakair Lodge on the West Arm of Nippissing for a couple weeks looking for muskies.  I absolutely love fishing this body of water for muskies every June and August and although they take alot of work to get them, I'm fortunate enough to do quite well up here and usually get 1 or 2 nice ones each trip.  I got this pretty lady my 1st trip out on Sunday and she measured 51 inches and thought I'd share the moment with the rest of you musky nuts.  I was alone in the boat with the camera on a home made mount so the pictures not the best and some of the tail is missing, but it's not too bad.
WOW! A beauty for sure, Lew! Hope you and Diane are having a great time up there. Enjoy!

Congrats Lew.  Good to see you're starting the trip out wiht some good success.   Just raises the adrenaline levels for the rest of your time there.  Keep the pics coming and best of luck to ya over these two weeks.
Thanks guys, we're having a great trip so far. It's cool and windy which is exactly what I like for fish'n.
Way to go Lew!
awesome ski lew congrats
Good job lew hope the rest of the trip is as productive.   Art
Very nice, between you, Jim and Jim's boys those Muskie are getting a great work out this week  Maureen
Absolutely gorgeous Lew, and the fish is nice too
nice ski lew !!!!   great way to start the vacation,im sure you will top that one.....cant wait for the rest of the report....tight-lines      and good luck     shawn
Nice fish Lew!

Nice fish big guy!  West Arm sure brings back memories. When I was 12-14 years old we did a couple weeks every year to the Welcome Lodge (beside Lucky Strike).  No idea if its still there but that area was my favorite to fish hands down.  Nice perch, wallys near the cabin, walking the shoreline through the woods catching bass/pike and my 1st musky 33" came from there off a 1" beetle spin.  My brother's perch picture was used in the brochure for the place, that was cool back then.  I will hopefully return one day  Thanks for sharing.
Nice LEW!
Nice "ski" Lew , hope there is a couple more in the cards for ya !
Wow, what an awesome fish, and on your first day too. I hope you catch several more beauties like that.  And... Kudos on snapping a nice photo by yourself.
Beauty fish Lew. What lure and what technique were you using?
Nice Musky Lew !! I was up on the Franny with Mike last weekend and the G.F. caught the musky of a lifetime as her first fish. Pics are lower down in the forum.
Nice fish thanks for sharing.
awesome fish lew!!!
Thanks for taking the time Lew.

Thanks again folks, that fish came on a large black/orange spinnerbait.  I just got back to the cottage 30 minutes ago but lost possibly the very same fish earlier today. I was only about 100' off the spot and she hit as the bait splashed, gave a couple good headshakes, jumped 2 feet outta the water and threw the bait.  Oh well, it's good to see the fish win the odd tussle but I'll be going back for another visit this evening.
wow nice tank lew !!
Very nice Lew. Hope you are having a blast.
Excellent fish Lew, wish I could be up there!
Nice fish as said Lew,one day I'll get one ,hopefully.!!!!!.need to fish outside the box lol.
